mapper.insert: insert into board_attach(post_seq, file_path, file_size, status, file_name, file_uuid, file_type, regr_seq, first_insert_dt, updr_seq, last_update_dt ) values(#{postSeq}, #{filePath}, #{fileSize}, 1, #{fileName}, #{fileUuid}, #{fileType}, #{regrSeq}, sysdate, 0, sysdate )
mapper.update: update board_attach set status = 0, updr_seq = #{updrSeq}, last_update_dt = sysdate where post_seq = #{postSeq} and regr_seq = #{regrSeq} and status = 1
mapper.select: select post_seq, file_path, file_size, file_name, file_uuid, file_type, regr_seq, first_insert_dt, updr_seq, last_update_dt, status from board_attach where post_seq = #{postSeq} and status = 1 order by first_insert_dt desc
select count(1) from board_attach where post_seq = #{postSeq} and status = 1;
mapper.update: update board_attach set status = 0, updr_seq = #{updrSeq}, last_update_dt = sysdate where post_seq = #{postSeq} and file_uuid = #{fileUuid} and status = 1
